problem.p: A uniform bar of mass \(M\) and length \(D\) is rotating and translating along a horizontal and frictionless surface contained in the x-y plane. The bar is rotating counterclockwise as viewed from the screen with angular speed \(\omega\) and it is translating with speed \(v\) along the +x axis. At the instant \(t_1\), the middle picture in the figure below, what is the velocity of a point at the lower end of the bar? You can type "omega" for \( \omega \)
